name: Portrait of Young Cordelia Montrose
description: A tender portrait of a young woman in her late teens, painted with remarkable affection. Her eyes seem to hold both hope and melancholy, as if she alone knew what the future held.

character_interpretations.art_collector: Cordelia before the tragedy, captured at the moment of her greatest beauty and promise. This is the woman Sebastian loved.
character_interpretations.heiress: My mother as she was. So full of life, so full of dreams. This portrait haunts me.
